Address.label: Address
Address.value: 7900 EAST UNION AVENUE,SUITE 320, DENVER, Colorado, 80237, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gold Resource Corp is a gold and silver producer, developer and explorer with operations in Oaxaca, Mexico and Nevada, USA. It targets low capital expenditure projects with potential for generating high returns on capital. The Company offers its shareholders the option to convert their cash dividends into physical gold and silver and take delivery.
